text: Huawei P50, Huawei P50 Pro and Huawei P50 Pocket are smartphones developed and made by Huawei. They were released on July 29, 2021. They also launched to Huawei P50 Pocket for foldable smartphone. There are does not have a 5G. == Features == === Huawei P50 === Huawei P50 has 6.5 inch 1 billion colors 90hz OLED display, 4100mAh battery capacity, 8GB RAM, 13MP wide selfie camera, Qualcomm Snapdragon 884 4G chipset and 50MP wide back camera. === Huawei P50 Pro === Huawei P50 Pro has 6.6 inch 1 billion colors 120hz OLED display, 8GB and 12GB RAM, 4360mAh battery capacity, 50MP wide back camera, 13MP wide selfie camera and Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 4G chipset. == Software == === Global === They are runs EMUI 12 for the first launch, they can upgrade to other versions like EMUI 13 and EMUI 14 when they came out. === China === They are runs Harmony OS 2 for the first launch, they can upgrade to other versions like Harmony OS 3 and Harmony OS 4 when they came out. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Huawei mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2021 Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras
title: Huawei P50
